name: Partridge in a Pear Tree - New Greeting!
description:
Brand new for holiday 2013.  An instant classic inspired by the song.  Rumor has it, this original greeting could be the first in a series(!)..

All-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on partially recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.  J.Heloise cards are always blank inside - so you too can get creative!

name: Snowflake - Greeting Card
description:
The Snowflake is back!  A bestseller from 2012, this favorite card is now available again for the holidays.  Original artwork was inspired by Wilson "Snowflake" Bentley's photography.  Joyful cards for all winter occasions.

A blank 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

name: Happy Holidays - Greeting Card!
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

A brand-new card for the Holidays!  This artful greeting was created using watercolor brushstrokes in vivid color.  Perfect for celebrations, events, and more.  Only a limited number of cards will be printed, so order yours early!

name: Cat in Gray - Greeting Card
description:
Originally drawn in charcoal, this art piece captures the essence of our favorite feline.  (Sketched from a real cat, Parker, moving at top speed!)  A new card for holiday 2014 - and all occasions.  A limited number of cards will be printed, so get yours early.

A blank 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

name: HAPPY - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Inspired by old-fashioned typography, this watercolor work is truly all-occasion.  It's blank inside, so you can use it for anniversaries, birthdays, and more... or just send a 'Happy'! :-)

name: Mug - Greeting card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

A brand new design in watercolor, this vintage "I love you" mug says it all.  For the most cherished coffee drinkers in your life (or your favorite office wall!)

name: Vermont Winter - Greeting Card
description:
A blank 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Our favorite winter landscape has returned!  Vermont Winter paints the simplicity and rustic beauty of the Vermont countryside.  A watercolor with heart, this greeting makes for perfect holidays.

name: Wine - NEW Greeting!!
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.  Blank inside.

The popular art print "Wine" is now a greeting card!  Vibrant colors and vivid detail make this watercolor glass of Pinot a classic.  An easy way to say "congrats", and a perfect b'day gift for your favorite aficionados... (best when paired with a bottle of vino!)

*Greeting cards are printed in small batches; most are limited edition, so once sold out - can't be replaced!

name: CUSTOM CARD PACK
description:
Choose your own!  A 6-pack or 12-pack of your favorite J.Heloise originals, tied with a vintage fabric ribbon and hand-stamped "J.Heloise" tag.  

Specify your choices in the "additional comments/notes" during checkout, or email jheloise@gmail.com.  Or leave it to us and receive an assortment of card favorites!

All-occasion greeting cards are 5x7 with coordinating envelopes, always blank inside. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

name: Feel Better - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Beat the blues.. with greens & purple!  A blank notecard perfect for friends and family - and a staple for your stationery drawer.

name: Greeting Card - Flowers in a Ball Jar
description:
A blank 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

A bestselling watercolor and all-occasion greeting card, "Flowers in a Ball Jar" is a great way to send a smile.

*Also available as a full-sized print.  See "Art Prints"

name: Bicycle - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Also known as "Downhill Bicycle," this sketch-turned-greeting-card is great as a gift.  (And keep one for yourself..)

name: ILOVEU - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

A classic.  Blank inside.  Send it to "the one" or to everyone you love...

name: Pig - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Hailed "the cutest pig ever" by many farmer's market fans, this watercolor favorite makes a great gift.

name: Greeting Card - Strawberry!
description:
An all-occasion blank 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Brand new for summer, a strawberry for all occasions!  Based on a fresh-picked Vermont berry, artwork was done in watercolor/gouache and ink.  Ideal for birthdays, celebrations & decoration.

name: Chick - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Another adorable animal, part of the "animal series."  A perfect companion for the Pig card, "Chick" is great for baby showers, birthdays, or just a quick hello.

name: Happy Birthday - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont in small batches, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

A watercolor favorite in a full spectrum of hues.  This typography-inspired card is brand new for 2012.

Blank inside, this card is sized to fit a business-sized envelope (included) - so no extra postage is needed!

name: Sheep - NEW Greeting!!
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.  Blank inside.

This sheep is the third in the 'Animals' series.  Lovingly painted in watercolor, this little one is fresh off the farm.  Makes a great spring gift (esp. for baby showers and b'days!)..

*Greeting cards are printed in small batches; most are limited edition, so once sold out - can't be replaced!

name: Adirondack Chair - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

A perfect gift for your favorite "summerfolk" -- Adirondack Chair was painted in the Adirondacks, with love.

name: Pirateship! - NEW Greeting!!
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.  Blank inside.

The long-awaited Pirateship is here!!  A sketch in pencil, charcoal, and marker, inspired by an old book about ships & the sea...  Grab yours before they're gone.

*Greeting cards are printed in small batches; most are limited edition, so once sold out - can't be replaced!

name: Glacier Peak - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

This card takes its name from Glacier Mountain in the North Cascades of Washington state.  Inspired by a vintage postcard, it's what daydreams are made of...

name: Sailboat Spin - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Blank inside.  Printed in Vermont in small batches, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

Summer sailboats with spinnakers flying... a watercolor favorite, year-round.

name: Hair - Greeting Card
description:
An all-occasion 5x7 card with coordinating envelope. Printed in Vermont on recycled paper, packaged in eco-friendly plastic.

A favorite fashion illustration, "Hair" is filled with energy and style.

name: Wine - Art Print
description:
Brand-new art in watercolor/gouache.  Inspired by a favorite bottle of Le Grand Pinot Noir and some perfect lighting...

Print is available in 2 sizes:
h: 8.5" x 5" (actual art dimensions, printed on paper 8.5" x 11")
h: 11" x 7"  (actual art dimensions, printed on paper 11" x 14")

All prints are custom-done in the Northeast by an expert giclee printer.  Expect your print to ship 3-4 weeks after order is placed.  UV glass framing is strongly recommended.

name: Art Print - Flowers in a Ball Jar
description:
A J.Heloise original, this favorite watercolor from 2010 was inspired by the summer's best flowers (including a dandelion!).  Painted with love in Burlington VT.

"Flowers in a Ball Jar," is hand-signed, with overall dimensions 14" x 18". Image itself is 7" x 11".

Reproductions are very closely color-matched with the originals and printed on watercolor paper with archival inks.  Print ships unmatted; UV glass framing is highly recommended. 

*Click on the image to zoom.
